descriptor.name: Hair Strengthening Shampoo
descriptor.short_desc: Hair strengthening shampoo is a premium shampoo formulated to repair and revitalize weak, thin and damaged hair. Totally free of sulphate and paraben, it is powered with pure Rosemary and Tea Tree Essential Oils that help repair the damages to hair roots and shafts. Being free of sulphate, hair strengthening shampoo gently cleanses the scalp and tresses without stripping away vital lipids that make the hair stronger and smoother. It is also contains Soya Protein.
descriptor.long_desc: Hair strengthening shampoo is a premium shampoo formulated to repair and revitalize weak, thin and damaged hair. Totally free of sulphate and paraben, it is powered with pure Rosemary and Tea Tree Essential Oils that help repair the damages to hair roots and shafts. Being free of sulphate, hair strengthening shampoo gently cleanses the scalp and tresses without stripping away vital lipids that make the hair stronger and smoother. It is also contains Soya Protein.

descriptor.name: Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo
descriptor.short_desc:
Argan oil shampoo improves your hair-cleansing routine. You'll reduce dandruff, flakes, and frizz while enhancing shine and gloss to your hair. Argan oil shampoo reduces dryness brings back smoothness, restores silkiness and reduces hair loss. Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo protects your hair from styling and boosts hair growth.

Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is rich nourishing anti-dryness shampoo power comes from pure Moroccan argon oil thats rich in vitamin e and fatty acids to gently remove dryness and restore hair health. It is free from toxic sulphates, parabens, and silicones that can damage your scalp and increase the chance of hair loss. Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is with Natural DHT Blockers has been formulated to bring back smoothness, restore silkiness, and reduce hair loss in extra dry hair. It is suitable for all hair types.
descriptor.long_desc:
Argan oil shampoo improves your hair-cleansing routine. You'll reduce dandruff, flakes, and frizz while enhancing shine and gloss to your hair. Argan oil shampoo reduces dryness brings back smoothness, restores silkiness and reduces hair loss. Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo protects your hair from styling and boosts hair growth.

Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is rich nourishing anti-dryness shampoo power comes from pure Moroccan argon oil thats rich in vitamin e and fatty acids to gently remove dryness and restore hair health. It is free from toxic sulphates, parabens, and silicones that can damage your scalp and increase the chance of hair loss. Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is with Natural DHT Blockers has been formulated to bring back smoothness, restore silkiness, and reduce hair loss in extra dry hair. It is suitable for all hair types.

descriptor.name: Rice Water Shampoo - 300ml
descriptor.short_desc: Rice water shampoo  is rejuvenates your damaged hair and weak, irritated scalp with the deeply nourishing goodness. It is a restoring care for your damaged hair and weak, irritated scalp. Delivers the goodness of rice water, rice keratin protein and lavender essential oil. The actives help to strengthen strands, stimulate weak roots, boost shine and add volume to hair. Leaves your hair feeling soft, shiny, thick and enveloped in fresh fragrance.
